text: "Planet Caravan" is a 1970 song by heavy metal band Black Sabbath and taken from their second studio album Paranoid. == Pantera cover == "Planet Caravan" was covered by American heavy metal band Pantera and taken from their seventh studio album Far Beyond Driven. It went to number 26 in the United Kingdom. Category:Rock songs Category:1970 songs Category:Black Sabbath songs Category:Pantera songs
title: Planet Caravan
